amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of any U.S. contributions to the International Fund for Ireland from being used for any enterprise in Northern Ireland which does not support fair employment and antidiscrimination practices in the workplace.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of any contribution of U.S. funds for the International Fund for Ireland to be used for any enterprise in Northern Ireland which does not support fair employment and antidiscrimination practices in the workplace.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
